definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_tree_mangrove"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><field name="type">mangrove</field><field name="foliage_density">70</field><field name="base_height">6</field><field name="height_variation_a">1</field><field name="height_variation_b">2</field><field name="branch_per_log_probability">0.5</field><field name="force_dirt">FALSE</field><field name="ignore_vines">TRUE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This block represents a mangrove tree, and should generate during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage.</comment><value name="dirt"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">Blocks.DIRT#0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that will be placed under the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="trunk"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:BogwoodLog</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="foliage"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:BogwoodLeaves</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the leaves</comment></block></value><value name="root_placer"><block type="root_placer_none"></block></value><value name="can_grow_through"><block type="block_holderset_tag"><field name="tag">minecraft:mangrove_logs_can_grow_through</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Mangrove logs can replace blocks in this tag</comment></block></value><value name="decorator0"><block type="tree_decorator_leave_vine"><field name="probability">0.125</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Mangrove trees generate with vines around them</comment></block></value><value name="decorator1"><block type="tree_decorator_attached_to_leaves"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="probability">0.14</field><field name="exclusion_radius_xz">1</field><field name="exclusion_radius_y">0</field><field name="required_empty_blocks">2</field><field name="direction0">DOWN</field><value name="provider"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:FloweringBogwoodLeaves</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">1</field><field name="max">4</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR_WG</field><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><next><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter"><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
